title: Fifa 20 ratings: Top 100 players revealed ahead of demo and game release date
text:
Fifa has unveiled the top 100 players in the new game, ahead of its full release.

The full list includes all of the players you'd expect, running all the way from Sergio Aguero to Luis Suarez.

But players will have to wait until the following week to find out how those players are actually ranked, and how they stack up against each other.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

For now, EA Sports has only unveiled the players that made the cut, and there are few surprises.

It ranks the 100 players according to their positions in a big list on its website.

Shape Created with Sketch. Fifa 20's Volta mode Show all 9 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch. Fifa 20's Volta mode 1/9 2/9 3/9 Rio de Janeiro 4/9 Paris 5/9 6/9 Amsterdam 7/9 Amsterdam 8/9 London 9/9 1/9 2/9 3/9 Rio de Janeiro 4/9 Paris 5/9 6/9 Amsterdam 7/9 Amsterdam 8/9 London 9/9

To promote the release, EA Sports revealed a new video featuring Sterling, Kaká, João Félix.

The full list will arrive on 9 September.

That is shortly before the expected arrival of the demo, which is rumoured to be coming on 12 September.

The full game will then be released on 27 September, though players can get it three days earlier if they order the Champions Edition.

It will be released on PS4, Xbox One, PC and Nintendo Switch.
